snippet: On the fifth day of hearings, the track star’s lawyer made an impassioned plea to keep him out of prison, while the prosecution urged a 10-year sentence.
abstract: Lawyer for Oscar Pistorius makes impassioned plea to keep South African track star out of prison for killing his girlfriend; prosecution counters with a demand that he be sent to prison for minimum of 10 years.
lead_paragraph: On the fifth day of hearings, the track star’s lawyer made an impassioned plea to keep him out of prison, while the prosecution urged a 10-year sentence.

headline.main: At Pistorius Hearing, Fervent Arguments Over Punishment
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Prosecution Seeks 10 Years in Prison for Pistorius
